name: Port Amadeus
description:
A visual novel where you play a down-on-her-luck courier living in a futuristic port city. After witnessing a murder during a routine delivery and fleeing from the scene, Carina finds herself gaining some unlikely allies in the search for the truth behind the homicide. Three possible love interests/routes, each with one Good End and one Bad End. Rated...eh, let's say R, but not R-18. Enjoy!

[[THE EARLIEST ALPHA YOU CAN IMAGINE: All six endings are playable but game will continue to receive major updates (UI, character art, etc.) in the coming weeks.]]
